props.initial: Initial direction of the chevron. Valid values are: 'down', 'left' ,'right' and 'up'
props.rotate90: If `true` rotates chevron by 90 degrees. Default is 180 degrees
props.triangle: Use filled triangle instead of chevron
props.clockwise: Rotate chevron clockwise. Default is counter clockwise
props.switch: Flick this to rotate the chevron to initial/rotated position
props.icon: Name of the icon to use instead of default chevron
